confirm_org_deletion: Are you sure you want to delete the organization?

dialog_create_org.title: Let's start creating your organization.
dialog_create_org.empty_email_warning: If there is no email, your email will be used.
dialog_create_org.success_message: Organization created! Invite people with the link copied to your clipboard.
dialog_create_org.email_sent_message: A verification email has been sent to the organization's email, please confirm the email.
dialog_create_org.email_fail_message: There was a problem sending the verification email, please request a new attempt later.

dialog_email_verification.success_message: We have sent you an email, please verify your account.
dialog_email_verification.fail_message: An error occurred while sending the verification email, you can try later.

error_email_sent: There was a problem sending the email, please try again later.
name: Name
warn_cant_create_org: You can't create a organization before verify your email
warn_email_verification: To use all the app's features, please verify your email.
